transcript: I get asked a lot like how do you keep going how do you keep pushing to the next level the thing that I try and focus on now is the Delta between how hard I tried and how hard I can possibly try and if I know that the gap between those two is zero then I have one and so whenever I get an opportunity where something's really hard it's flipped in my mind to like wow what an opportunity for me to empty the tank what an what an opportunity for me to end at zero if you're obsessive on the external thing that takes too long and you will give up too soon
